title: Completing grayscale application releases based on Jenkins and Argocd
description: The article discusses how to implement a grayscale release in Jenkins and Argo CD-based continuous delivery. To use Argo rollouts, developers need to modify their applications using the Rollout controller instead of the Deployment Controller. Developers should also redevelop Helm Charts to create the templates required by Argo rollouts. By maintaining a separate set of applications, including the service, ingress, and deployment, they can complete the grayscale release by switching. The article also highlights the key knowledge points required for this process, such as helm charts, jenkins pipeline, argo rollouts, and argocd.
